metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3030 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An improper access control issue in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions starting before 15.1.6, all versions from 15.2 before 15.2.4, all versions from 15.3 before 15.3.2 allows disclosure of pipeline status to unauthorized users.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
